name: Packet Capture Data Part 2
summary: A PCAP2 file is the second part of a packet capture created by Wireshark, a free program used for network data analysis. It is always paired with a corresponding .PCAP file, which contains the packet capture's first part. Multipart packet captures may also include PCAP3, PCAP4, etc. files, depending on how many parts the data was split into.
